name: My Summer on Kaiju Island
description:
WASD: Walk

Hold Left Shift: Run

Mouse: Rotate Camera/Select Dialogue Choices

E: Interact
Who would have thought that signing up for a mysterious internship would lead to such an extreme summer! Help out Scientific Warrior BeamMan run his Kaiju sanctuary in this short jam game.

Made for Kaiju Jam 2022

All assets made during the jam period by:

Isaac LaRussa: Textures, Models, 2D Animation, Writing, Concept

Hadley Richardson-O'Brien: Models, 3D Animation, Programming

Zucchini: Music

Except for:

Sounds from Freesound.org:

waves-beach-nighttime - eelke

walking-on-gravel - mars-98

sizzling - jasonelrod

clicks - jraybartley

beam - kastenfrosch

anoa-bison-combo - animadierer

monster-roar - soundmast123

Dialogue System by PixelCrushers
